          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Apoteket</string>
            <string language="en">Pharmacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Apotheke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pharmacie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pharmacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Farmacia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φαρμακείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Farmacia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på sammanhang i text samtidigt som vi lär oss om Apoteket.Modul 7 - Fungerar det? - Sverige 6.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here we train the context of the text while we learn about the pharmacy. Module 7 - Will it work? - Sweden 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier bilden wir den Kontext des Textes aus, 
während wir über die Apotheke erlernen. Modul 7 - 
Funktioniert es? - Schweden 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici nous formons le contexte du texte tandis que 
nous nous renseignons sur la pharmacie. Module 7 - 
Fonctionnera-t-cela ? - la Suède 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui nós treinamos o contexto do texto quando 
nós aprendermos sobre o pharmacy. Módulo 7 - 
Trabalhará? - Sweden 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui addestriamo il contesto del testo mentre 
impariamo circa la farmacia. Modulo 7 - Funzionerà? 
- la Svezia 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκπαιδεύουμε το πλαίσιο του κειμένου ενώ 
μαθαίνουμε για το φαρμακείο. Ενότητα 7 - θα λειτουργήσει; 
- Σουηδία 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí entrenamos al contexto del texto mientras 
que aprendemos sobre la farmacia. Módulo 7 - ¿Trabajará?
- Suecia 6. Safir.</string>
          </description>
